sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Christ above all exalted, as in justification so in sanctification. Wherein severall passages in Dr. Crisps sermons are answered. / Delivered in a sermon at Rye, in the county of Sussex: by John Benbrigge minister of Gods Word at Ashburnham, in the same county:. Benbrigge, John.
[8], 40 p.
Printed for John Stafford, and are to be sold at his house in Brides Church-yard, London: : 1645.
A reply to: Crisp, Tobias. Christ alone exalted. Annotation on Thomason copy: "7bre 9th" [i.e. September? 9th; bound with items from September, but Thomason catalogue lists under October]. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
Christ above all exalted, as in justification so in sanctification. Wherein severall passages in Dr. Crisps sermons are answered. / Delivered in a sermon at Rye, in the county of Sussex: by John Benbrigge minister of Gods Word at Ashburnham, in the same county:. Benbrigge, John.
[8], 40 p.
Printed for John Stafford, and are to be sold at his house in Brides Church-yard, London: : 1645.
A reply to: Crisp, Tobias. Christ alone exalted. Annotation on Thomason copy: "7bre 9th" [i.e. September? 9th; bound with items from September, but Thomason catalogue lists under October]. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
John Stafford
his house in Brides Church-yard
